com.github.deltaspikedbunit.dbunit

Class DbUnitRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.deltaspikedbunit.dbunit.DbUnitRunner

  • public class DbUnitRunner
extends Object
    Exposes methods to execute before and after test runs using DatabaseSetup, DatabaseTearDown and ExpectedDatabase annotations.
    Author:
    Luigi Bitonti

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DbUnitRunner(org.dbunit.database.IDatabaseConnection dbUnitConnection)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DbUnitRunner

        public DbUnitRunner(org.dbunit.database.IDatabaseConnection dbUnitConnection)

    • Method Detail

      • dbUnitOperation

        protected org.dbunit.operation.DatabaseOperation dbUnitOperation(DbUnitConfiguration dbUnitConfiguration,
                                                     DatabaseOperation databaseOperation)
        Extracts a DBUnit database operation from a given configuration and internal database operation.
        Parameters:
        dbUnitConfiguration - current configuration
        databaseOperation - internal database operation
        Returns:
        a DBUnit database operation. If no internal operation is selected, a CLEAN_INSERT default operation is returned

      • dataSetLoader

        protected DataSetLoader dataSetLoader(DbUnitConfiguration dbUnitConfiguration)
        Selects a dataset loader, given a configuration.
        Parameters:
        dbUnitConfiguration -
        Returns:
        a dataset loader. Default is FlatXmlDataSetLoader if no configuration available

      • loadDataSets

        protected List<org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet> loadDataSets(DbUnitTestContext testContext,
                                             DatabaseSetup dbSetup)
        Loads all datasets related to the db setup stage. Dataset location is relative to the test class.
        Parameters:
        testContext - current test context
        dbSetup - database setup annotation (can be at class or method level)
        Returns:
        the datasets list

      • loadDataSets

        protected List<org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet> loadDataSets(DbUnitTestContext testContext,
                                             DatabaseTearDown dbTearDown)
        Loads all datasets related to the db tear down stage. Dataset location is relative to the test class.
        Parameters:
        testContext - current test context
        dbTearDown - database tear down annotation (can be at class or method level)
        Returns:
        the datasets list

      • verifyExpected

        public void verifyExpected(DbUnitTestContext testContext)
                    throws Exception
        Verifies expected db content.
        Parameters:
        testContext - current test context to lookup class and method level annotations
        Throws:
        Exception

      • verifyExpected

        protected void verifyExpected(DbUnitTestContext testContext,
                  List<ExpectedDatabase> annotations)
                       throws Exception
        Verifies expected db content. If an exception is found in the test context, from one of the preceding stages, verification is skipped.
        Parameters:
        testContext - current test context
        annotations - expected database annotations. These are verified from last to first and all the following checks are skipped once an override value of true is found.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • prepareTesterSetup

        public void prepareTesterSetup(DbUnitTestContext testContext,
                      DbUnitConfiguration dbUnitConfiguration,
                      org.dbunit.IDatabaseTester databaseTester)
        Adds all declared database setup related datasets to a DBUnit database tester.
        Parameters:
        testContext - the current test context
        dbUnitConfiguration - the current test configuration
        databaseTester - the DBUnit database tester

      • prepareTesterTearDown

        public void prepareTesterTearDown(DbUnitTestContext testContext,
                         DbUnitConfiguration dbUnitConfiguration,
                         org.dbunit.IDatabaseTester databaseTester)
        Adds all declared database tear down related datasets to a DBUnit database tester.
        Parameters:
        testContext - the current test context
        dbUnitConfiguration - the current test configuration
        databaseTester - the DBUnit database tester
